question: Which city is to host India’s home matches during 2020 Hockey Pro League?
explanation: Bhubaneswar will host the India’s home matches during 2020 Hockey Pro League. The International Hockey Federation (FIH) said, the second edition of the Hockey Pro League will be played between 11th of January and 28th of June. Bhubaneswar has become a hockey hub in India and has been hosting a majority of tournaments, the most recent being the Olympic qualifiers.
